mapper.select: SELECT * FROM inquiry WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY in_addDate DESC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(in_addDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM inquiry

mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE ino = #{ino}
